meaningMnemonic: The <radical>mouth</radical> of a <radical>tree</radical> <radical>leader</radical> is all about trying to <kanji>preserve</kanji> the trees. In fact, she <kanji>guarantee</kanji>s that she will preserve the trees if it's the last thing she does.
readingMnemonic: She chains herself to a tree to <kanji>preserve</kanji> them. But, unfortunately, the lumberjacks just take a giant back <reading>hoe</reading> (ほ) and tear this tree leader and the tree she's attached to in half.
